div.p: Constellation Schools provides every child an opportunity to obtain an excellent education built on a foundation of character education for life long success.

p.span: Please click the following link to view weekly updates, assignments, and other information provided by your teachers. There's also access to a virtual career fair.

strong.span:
Call Center for COVID-19/Coronavirus
Ohio Department of Health
1-833-4-ASK-ODH
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
For the general public regarding questions about Coronavirus
Cuyahoga County established a helpline for residents who have general questions about Coronavirus. This helpline is in addition to the Ohio Department of Health's call center.

strong.span:
COVID CareLine for Mental Health Support
Ohio Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services
1-800-720-9616
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
This toll-free, confidential careline provides emotional support to individuals who may be struggling to cope with current challenges in their lives.

br.span: Please click the following link to view resources provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the Ohio Department of Health regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), including multilingual resources.
Please click the following link to view information and resources provided by Constellation Schools to assist your family during the school closure.

div.h1: From the Desk of Principal Piazza...

img.alt: Mrs. Piazza, Principal
img.title: Mrs. Piazza, Principal
img.style: width: 23%; height: 32%; float: right; margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 7px;

p.img: Welcome to Constellation Schools: Puritas Community Elementary & Middle. We are a K-8 building serving approximately 350 students. Our goal is to provide a safe and nurturing environment for students to learn and grow. We have high academic and behavioral expectations, with rigorous coursework and a strong focus on Character Education and Positive Behavior Intervention and Supports (PBIS). We also offer band, choir, and a variety of after-school clubs and sports to enhance your student’s educational experience. Our staff is dedicated to creating engaging lessons utilizing our 1:1 technology on a regular basis to ensure that our students are prepared for success in high school and beyond.

div.p: Thank you for visiting our website. If you would like more information or would like to set up a tour, please call our elementary office at 216-688-0680 or our middle school office at 216-251-1596. We would love to show you what our school is all about. We truly believe that our school is “The Right Choice for Parents and a Real Chance for Children.”

p.br: SaferOH tip line will allow students and adults to anonymously share information with school officials and law enforcement about threats to student safety - whether that involved threatened mass incident or harm of a single student.

div.p: Constellation Schools: Puritas Community Middle does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies:
